adv: The bookmark tool is helpful for marking all the important graphics that are needed to answer the question. It is helpful to use the related views though I found it easier to just explore different tabs on my own.
disadv: For me, it took a while for all the graphs to load when switching between the different variables. I'm using Safari so that might be the issue.
comment: For the related views, it might be helpful to be able to select which variable you wish to see related views for. Having them listed randomly discouraged me from using them.
